CustomField.formula: IF( telegenta__Next_Call_Time__c - NOW() > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( telegenta__Next_Call_Time__c - NOW() ) ) & ":" & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (telegenta__Next_Call_Time__c - NOW() ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & ":" & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (telegenta__Next_Call_Time__c - NOW() ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ), "" )
CustomField.label: TimeToNextCall
